channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 印度中央银行要求全国的贷款机构停止与信用卡网络签订排他性协议，这一出人意料的举措可能会对全球最大的支付公司造成打击。
item.description:
India’s central bank told the nation’s lenders to stop entering into exclusive agreements with credit card networks, in a surprise move that may deal a blow to the world’s largest payments firms https://t.co/xbiTLYYYv1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: Indorama 是泰国市值第二大的化学品制造商，在创纪录的年度亏损引发业务大调整之后，该公司计划明年将其在美国的业务部门上市，以筹集约 7 亿美元的资金。
item.description:
Indorama, Thailand’s second-largest chemical maker by market value, aims to raise about $700 million from the listing of its US unit next year after a record annual loss sparked a business overhaul https://t.co/Fp2XaG2MFh

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 对冲基金债券空头减少表明交易基础解除
item.description:
Diminishing Hedge Fund Bond Shorts Point to Basis-Trade Unwinds https://t.co/17tvY2XtfX

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 根据气候变化智库 InfluenceMap 的一份报告，加拿大最大银行的化石燃料业务风险是欧美同行的两倍多。
item.description:
Canada’s biggest banks are more than twice as exposed to the fossil-fuel business as their European and US counterparts, according to a report from climate change think tank InfluenceMap https://t.co/xSx4el9zDH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: @johnauthers 说：比特币已经起死回生，应该继续发展下去。这种渴望已久的合法性终于实现了吗？
item.description:
Bitcoin has risen from the dead and should keep going, says @johnauthers. Is that long-sought legitimacy finally happening? https://t.co/mrVDsfLM7F

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: "期待混乱"：这里是世界上粮食最充足的地区之一--但欧盟却在为可能发生的粮食危机做准备
item.description:
"Expect chaos": It's one of the best-fed regions in the world — but the EU is wargaming a possible food crisis https://t.co/BHUDikOWp4

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度国营炼油厂正在回避与俄罗斯的原油供应合同，因为在美国加强制裁的情况下，一度繁荣的俄罗斯原油贸易变得更加困难。
item.description:
India’s state-run oil refiners are shying away from contracted Russian crude supply as the once-booming trade becomes much harder under tighter enforcement of US sanctions https://t.co/AqqRLSyprM

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 黄金及其酝酿中的数字对手比特币在同一天创下历史新高。这对您的投资意味着什么 ⬇️
item.description:
Gold and its mooted digital rival Bitcoin just hit their all-time highs — on the same day. What does this mean for your investments ⬇️ https://t.co/zFgeizoHbm

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 杰富瑞（Jefferies）认为，如果内地股票基准能够保持近期的反弹势头，中国政府主导的基金为支持市场而购买股票的行为可能会放缓。
item.description:
Equity purchases by Chinese government-led funds aimed at supporting the market will likely slow down if mainland stock benchmarks can hold their recent rebound, according to Jefferies https://t.co/vRc96q6KMw

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度央行要求 JM Financial 停止批准或发放任何形式的股票和债券融资，包括 IPO 贷款
item.description:
India’s central bank asks JM Financial to stop approving or disbursing any form of financing against shares and debentures, including loans for IPO https://t.co/gq1y6lkxa1

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 比特币两年多来首次飙升至创纪录水平，随后因交易者获利回吐而迅速回落
item.description:
Bitcoin surged to a record for the first time in more than two years before rapidly retreating as traders took some profits https://t.co/buH8B5OT8V

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 数以千计的医生举行游行，反对增加医学院招生人数的计划，韩国警方将对游行中的关键人物进行讯问
item.description:
South Korean police are set to question key figures in a walkout by thousands of doctors who oppose a plan to increase medical school enrollments https://t.co/txx3XIJxHS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 随着 K-pop 和 K 文化的日益流行，世界 50 佳酒吧正通过韩国烧酒获得成功
item.description:
As K-pop and K-culture grow ever more popular, the World's 50 Best Bars are finding success with Korean soju https://t.co/0Jhdl8Gx1b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 中国最大煤矿企业董事长表示，中国炼焦煤行业需要更多的国家保护，包括限制供应
item.description:
China’s coking coal sector need more state protection, including restrictions on supply, according to the chairman of its biggest miner https://t.co/buS0EOAJWj

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 秘鲁总理阿尔贝托-奥塔罗拉（Alberto Otarola）周二晚间辞职，据其 X 账户上的帖子称，此前有报道称他与一名获得政府合同的女性有恋爱关系。
item.description:
Peru Prime Minister Alberto Otarola resigned Tuesday evening, according to a post on his X account, after it was reported he had a romantic relationship with a woman who obtained government contracts https://t.co/j7aCfPc7vy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 在欧佩克+（OPEC+）集团同意延长减产后，沙特阿拉伯提高了下个月向亚洲买家提供的主要石油等级的价格
item.description:
Saudi Arabia increased prices of its main oil grade to buyers in Asia next month after the OPEC+ group agreed to extend output cuts https://t.co/RPmtOwT9a6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 加拿大养老金计划投资委员会裁减了约 10% 的香港员工
item.description:
Canada Pension Plan Investment Board has eliminated about 10% of its Hong Kong staff https://t.co/9soApzVlze

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 首席经济学家保罗-康威（Paul Conway）表示，如果美联储在今年晚些时候开始放松政策，新西兰央行可能会比目前预期的更早开始降息。
item.description:
New Zealand’s central bank may be able to start cutting interest rates sooner than it currently expects to if the Fed begins easing later this year, chief economist Paul Conway said https://t.co/7FR6jsvSLE

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 印度卢比在今年头两个月的表现优于所有新兴市场同类货币

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 一家激进基金已成为日本青空银行（Aozora Bank）的最大股东，而青空银行是日本蓝筹股中股价缩水最严重的股票，这使该基金与投机者形成了鲜明对比
item.description:
An activist fund has become the biggest shareholder in Japan’s Aozora Bank, the most-shorted stock on the country’s blue-chip gauge, pitting it against speculators https://t.co/4K08be5wgH

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 受美国降息预期提振，黄金在飙升至历史新高后趋于稳定
item.description:
Gold steadied after surging to a record high, boosted by expectations for US rate cuts https://t.co/PvCvx014z0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 新消息：随着私营保险公司撤出美国最易发生野火和飓风的市场，"最后手段 "州立房屋保险计划正在吸收数万亿美元的风险。阅读大事件 ⬇️
item.description:
NEW: “Last resort” state home insurance programs are absorbing trillions of dollars in risk as private insurers pull out of the US markets most prone to wildfires and hurricanes.

Read The Big Take ⬇️ https://t.co/OXYUVV4sq6

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 星展集团削减了首席执行官 Piyush Gupta 的浮动薪酬部分，因为该银行的数字服务受到干扰，今年的业绩创下新高
item.description:
DBS cut CEO Piyush Gupta’s variable pay components in a record year marred by disruptions in the bank’s digital services https://t.co/VFGl2Ywl8L

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 由于高利率和生活成本上涨拖累了家庭支出，澳大利亚经济在去年最后三个月有所放缓
item.description:
Australia’s economy slowed in the final three months of last year as elevated interest rates and rising living costs dragged on household spending https://t.co/Bx3Ix7L63Q

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 据《海峡时报》报道，面临腐败指控的新加坡前交通部长伊斯瓦兰（S. Iswaran）在墨尔本住院治疗后出院。
item.description:
Singapore’s former transport minister S. Iswaran, who is facing corruption charges, was hospitalized in Melbourne and discharged, the Straits Times reported https://t.co/n0tSm2z6mT

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 6, 2024

item.title: 比特币周二短暂突破 69,000 美元，超过了 2021 年底达到的历史峰值，令机构和散户投资者为之振奋。
item.description:
Bitcoin briefly topped $69,000 on Tuesday, surpassing the all-time peak it achieved in late 2021 and energizing institutional and retail investors alike https://t.co/2YxADp6WU0

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) March 5, 2024
